xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels
Class EpanechnikowKernel

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels.KernelFunction
      xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels.EpanechnikowKernel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Integrable, RealFunction
public class EpanechnikowKernel
extends KernelFunction
implements Integrable

This class models the Epanechnikow kernel function. Thus, it extends KernelFunction. Since the primitive is known, this class also implements Integrable.

See Also:
KernelFunction, Kernels, KernelFunctionND, KernelBandwidths
